fields.name: WhoIsOurTopCompetition
fields.fieldText: Who is our top competition in this opportunity?

fields.name: WhereAreWeStrongDifferentiators
fields.fieldText: Where are we strong (Differentiators) and where are we weak relative to the competition as perceived by the customer?

fields.name: WhatIsYourPlanToCounterYourCompetition
fields.fieldText: What is your plan to counter your competition's sales strategy?

fields.name: HaveSeniorManagementBoughtIntoTheStrategy
fields.fieldText: Have senior management bought into the strategy and have we engaged / presented to them?

fields.name: WhatAreTheNextMilestones
fields.fieldText: What are the next milestones (micro goals) to achieve next? How can we make the next step EASY for them?

fields.name: AreWeStuck
fields.fieldText: Are we stuck? If stuck, track your way back and go back to the roots where we started. Can we move via an agency?

fields.fieldText: Who is our top competition in this opportunity?

fields.name: POC_Type
fields.fieldText: POC Type

fields.name: POC_Duration_Months
fields.fieldText: POC Duration (Months)

fields.name: POC_Start_Date
fields.fieldText: Planned POC Start Date

fields.name: POC_End_Date
fields.fieldText: Planned POC End Date

fields.name: POC_Scope
fields.fieldText: POC Scope

fields.name: POCSuccessCriteriaObjectives
fields.fieldText: POC Success Criteria

fields.name: Important_Notes_For_Customer_Onboarding_Team
fields.fieldText: Important Notes For Customer Onboarding Team

fields.name: WhatIsTheCustomersCriteria
fields.fieldText: What is the customer's criteria for selection? What is the Business Decision Criteria (BDC)? What is the Technical Decision Criteria (TDC)?

fields.name: WhatAreTheHighestPriorityRequired
fields.fieldText: What are the highest priority Required Capabilities? How will these criteria be weighted during the decision process? What other criteria have they told us about?

fields.name: HowDoesOurTechnologyAlignWithTheir
fields.fieldText: How does our technology align with their business and technical wish list?

fields.name: IsthereAnyTechnicalBlockers
fields.fieldText: Is there any technical blockers we need to resolve ASAP? How we can solve it? What is the action plan?

fields.name: HaveYouIdentifiedAndMetWithTheEconomicBuyer
fields.fieldText: Have you identified and met with the Economic Buyer? How do you know they’re actually the Economic Buyer versus someone higher?

fields.name: WhatAreTheBusinessUseCases
fields.fieldText: What are the business use-cases? Is your champion leveraging such use-cases and respective metrics?

fields.name: ReasonToBuyUs
fields.fieldText: Reason to buy us? What they liked about products?

fields.name: HowManyWOWMoments
fields.fieldText: How Many WOW Moments Did You Create During Meeting?

fields.name: WhatTheyDidntLikeAboutInsiderProducts
fields.fieldText: What they didn't like about Insider Products?

fields.name: FromTheirPointOfView
fields.fieldText: From their point of view, how are they looking at the milestones?

fields.name: ChitChatTopicsThatWorkedWell
fields.fieldText: Chit chat topics that worked well

fields.name: WhatDoesYourChampion
fields.fieldText: What does your Champion OR the EB care about most?

fields.name: HowDoesTheirDecisionMakingProcess
fields.fieldText: How does their decision making process look like? Who else will be involved?

fields.name: WhyAreTheyBuying
fields.fieldText: Why are they buying? What are the problems that the prospect is most challenged with?

fields.name: HowImportantIsToSolveTheseProblems
fields.fieldText: How important is to solve these problems to his/her personal/department goals?

fields.name: WhatsTheAnticipatedTimeline
fields.fieldText: What’s the anticipated timeline? Are there any events/deadlines to get it done asap? Any major marketing season? any seasonal targets to hit?

fields.name: ToolsTheyUse
fields.fieldText: Tools they use (competitors, any 3rd party tech)

fields.name: DoesTheProspectWorkWithTheCompetitor
fields.fieldText: Does the prospect work with the competitor? Where they struggle the most?

fields.name: RaiseAndRenewalErrorMessage
fields.fieldText: "MRR Raise" and "Renewal" opportunities cannot be updated as "POC".

fields.name: OpportunityPrimarySourceAndMarketingInfluenceScoreErrorMessage
fields.fieldText: Opportunity Primary Score and Marketing Influence Score fields can not be passed empty.

fields.name: NotificationBody
fields.fieldText:
You have sent a request for POC.

After your request is approved, the stage will be changed to POC. If your request is rejected, please refer to the POC Approval section to find the reason for the rejection. You can update the necessary information and try again.

﻿
